--- title: "Plant Hydraulics Workshop 2024" description: "Plant hydraulics workshop - July 2024" author: - name: Daphna Uni affiliation: University of Arizona date: 08-21-2024 categories: [plant hydraulics, plant water potential, workshops] image: Daphna_Uni.jpeg draft: false filters: - lightbox lightbox: auto --- The 2nd Plant Hydraulics Workshop took place in July 2024 at the Highlands Biological Station in beautiful North Carolina! # Day 1 ## Learning topic: Leaf water potential Instructors included Daniel Beverly and Dan Johnson : ::: {.cell} ::: ::::::::: {layout="[[30, -2, 30, -2, 30]]"}
![](IMG_1.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![Learning about how plant's water potential works](IMG_2.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![Student Macarena Ferris and Instructor Daniel B. picking the best branch for our measurements!](IMG_3.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![Daniel B. and the "best" available branch](IMG_4.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![Instructor Dan Johnson](IMG_5.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![](IMG_6.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
::::::::: # Day 2 ## Learning topic: Sapflow and data loggers Instructors included Chris Oishi and Ana Maria Restrepo-Acevedo. ::::: {layout="[[45, -5, 45]]" layout-valign="center"}
![Practicing datalogger programming](IMG_7.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![Practicing datalogger wireing and programming](IMG_8.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
::::: ## Afternoon trip to a waterfall ::::: {layout="[[45, -5, 45]]" layout-valign="center"}
![](IMG_11.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![](IMG_12.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
::::: # Day 3 ## Learning topic: Conductivity Instructed by Bill Hammond and Marylou Mantova. We learned how to measure and quantify the specific conductive wood area, vessel length with a pressure chamber, and embolism evens with a 'cavicam'. :::::::: {layout="[[45, -5, 45]]" layout-valign="center"}
![Instructor Bill Hammond explaining the process of using a 'cavicam'](IMG_13.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![](IMG_14.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![](IMG_15.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
![](IMG_16.jpg){group="mygallery2"}
